title: Budget Approval
desc: Approve the annual budget allocation for departments.

title: Project Funding
desc: Decide on the funding allocation for upcoming projects.

title: Policy Amendment
desc: Review and approve proposed changes to company policies.

title: New Hiring Plan
desc: Discuss and approve the hiring plan for the next quarter.

title: Tech Upgrade
desc: Evaluate the proposal for upgrading company infrastructure.

title: Partnership Agreement
desc: Approve a strategic partnership with a major stakeholder.

title: Employee Benefits
desc: Vote on additional employee benefits and perks.

title: Marketing Strategy
desc: Finalize the upcoming year's marketing approach.

title: Office Relocation
desc: Decide whether to move to a new office space.
